short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to censor climbing beta on websites like Mountain Project and 8a.nu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BetaBlock is like adblock for climbing spray, so you can browse routes on 8a and mountain project without ruining onsight attempts when people put crux beta in comments, descriptions. There are toggles for different filters so you can decide your threshold of spray and always reveal content when necessary. Also user for preventing IFSC spoilers when visiting 8a.nu.
